block.p: LOCKHEED CORP., Calabasas, Calif., a military and space systems concern, said the Air Force's fleet of Lockheed C-141B Starlifters, which has been operating with restrictions because of cracks discovered in the transports' wings, will be 100 percent operational by the end of 1994. BROWNING-FERRIS CORP., Houston, a waste management concern, plans to increase its capital spending by 27 percent in 1994 to $962 million and is looking for acquisitions.

LOCKHEED CORP., Calabasas, Calif., a military and space systems concern, said the Air Force's fleet of Lockheed C-141B Starlifters, which has been operating with restrictions because of cracks discovered in the transports' wings, will be 100 percent operational by the end of 1994. BROWNING-FERRIS CORP., Houston, a waste management concern, plans to increase its capital spending by 27 percent in 1994 to $962 million and is looking for acquisitions.

WEST POINT-PEPPERELL INC., West Point, Ga., a woven and knitted apparel concern, completed its merger with Valley Fashions Corp. after shareholders approved a buyout. The surviving corporation, West Point Stevens Inc., also completed a $1.5 billion refinancing.
